name: ChlamydiaTrachomatisAndNeisseriaGonorrhoeaeCombinedTests
title: Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria Gonorrhoeae combined Tests
purpose: (Clinical Focus: A value set used in the Office of Population Affairs Title X Family Planning Annual Report (FPAR).),(Data Element Scope: A laboratory test which tests for both Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae, used to retrieve and populate dates for Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae labs.),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: )
